data.name: Heroes Raid
data.detailed_description:
Heroes Raid

Enter a dark dystopian world that combines demons, guns, swords, magic, monsters and modern technology. Play through multiple ever expanding story arcs.

Raids

Raids by yourself, or with friends. Level up, Collect loot, get rewards, and summon more power after a successful raid. Story raids are the same every time and dungeon raids are procedurally generated and will never be the same experience.


Deep Builds

Sacrifice your summoned heroes to gift their abilities to other heroes, gain unique bonus traits per summon such as fire attack or lightning defense, design your ultimate build. From a lightning assassin to a magic archer.

Team or Solo PvP Arena

Take a break from the raids and dominate other players in 4v4, 3v3, 2v2, and 1v1 PvP modes, with ladders and rewards.

data.short_description: Enter a dark dystopian world that combines demons, guns, swords, magic, monsters and modern technology. Raid alone or with your friends, craft your unique playstyle by mixing and matching abilities between heroes. Raids, Builds, Team PvP, and Solo PvP await.
data.supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Turkish, Bulgarian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, Hungarian, Norwegian, Romanian, Swedish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese, Italian, Arabic, Greek, Thai

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: 3ghz, 4 cores
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1060 3GB (Cards no older than 4 years)
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 3ghz , 8 cores
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Released during or after 2019, 8GB
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 8 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Recent
  • Processor: 3ghz, 4 cores
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Released during or after 2017, 4GB
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
